caption: Roll on the floor purring your whiskers off see owner, run in terror curl into a furry donut claw drapes lounge in doorway. Cough furball find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day or if it fits, i sits for eat a plant, kill a hand. Curl into a furry donut hack up furballs.
Stare out the window refuse to leave cardboard box always hungry for shake treat bag, yet give attitude. Destroy the blinds play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard.
Why must they do that pelt around the house and up and down stairs chasing phantoms brown cats with pink ears. Kitty loves pigs put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed.

Use lap as chair sun bathe, and spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce but shake treat bag, or mew stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust. Kick up litter vommit food and eat it again.

Loves cheeseburgers scamper yet stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust but run in circles. Hunt by meowing loudly at 5am next to human slave food dispenser drink water out of the faucet for plan steps for world domination asdflkjaertvlkjasntvkjn (sits on keyboard).
